articles.title: Dolly Parton to donate $1 million to Hurricane Helene relief efforts
articles.description: Dolly Parton announced a $1 million donation to the Mountain Ways Foundation to assist victims of Hurricane Helene.

articles.title: Massive Fire Erupts On Goods Train Carrying Diesel In Tamil Nadu
articles.description: A major fire broke out on four wagons of a goods train carrying diesel near the Tiruvallur railway station, causing panic in the surrounding areas.

articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank branch manager siphoned off Rs 31 crore of public money to gamble; Know how he misused customerâ€™s KYC details
articles.description: A Kotak Mahindra Bank branch manager in Bihar stole over Rs 31 crore of public funds to fuel his gambling addiction, misusing customer KYC details to open 21 accounts.
